title: Action Adventure Ledge Climbing Pack with Blueprint
description: This is a Blueprint Version of the Action Adventure Game Ledge Climbing Animations
longDescription:
Update 23/04/24: with leaps to side and back walls plus various bugs have been fixed. Video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H2BFf4lrDQU


Original old version - https://youtu.be/VKqO_1FYvu0

Preview - List of Animations -https://youtu.be/xBuNxy9wYKM https://youtu.be/rs1oucmniR8

Integration Tutorial - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c9Oym3gnVE4


Discord: https://discord.gg/Bb8qGgN4cC


Demo: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1g631GlNBk9eUjHOv0AudJR8dZSg_ssV3?usp=drive_link


Email - contact@motionbeats.studio


Technical Details

Features: Animations with blueprint.


My other assets in the market : https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/profile/Motionbeats+Studio?count=20&sortBy=effectiveDate&sortDir=DESC&start=0


Our studio work: https://www.motionbeats.studio/

These quality animations are all fully motion-captured and compatible with the Manny Skeleton.
technicalDetails:
Number of Animations: 102

Animation types : Root Motion

Aligned IK Hands/Legs : Yes

MotionWarping : Yes

Unreal version: 5.0 - 5.4

Unreal skeleton: Manny

Number of Blueprints: 11


Â AnimationWarping and MotionWarping plugins are required for product to function.


List of Blueprints: AN_EnableClimbMovement, AN_EnableHopAction, ArrowActor, BP_ThirdPersonCharacter, BP_ThirdPersonGameMode, ParkourABPInterface, ParkourActionVariables, ParkourComponent, ParkourFunctionLibrary ParkourInterface, ParkourStatsWidget_Interface, ReachLedgeIK


Input: Keyboard, Mouse

Network Replicated: (No)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Documentation about project : https://docs.google.com/document/d/1UaEYxw0kvmfmj-a81JRLbyv5kw2vmCcN/edit?usp=drive_link&ouid=107048402996820646069&rtpof=true&sd=true


How to Integrate Climb Ledge To Your Own Project: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Xde6JTtdGq81gL5_9wVhMzs4FX3h7uf4/edit?usp=drive_link&ouid=107048402996820646069&rtpof=true&sd=true
